description: [Kobalos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0641) replaced the SSH client with a trojanized SSH client to steal credentials on compromised systems.(Citation: ESET Kobalos Jan 2021)

external_references.description: M.Leveille, M., Sanmillan, I. (2021, January). A WILD KOBALOS APPEARS Tricksy Linux malware goes after HPCs. Retrieved August 24, 2021.
